Text: Eustoma russellianum:  Its previous binomial name was "Eustoma grandiflorum".

Text: Eustoma russellianum:  Common names include Texas bluebells, Texas bluebell, bluebell, showy prairie gentian, prairie gentian The Bolero Deep Blue, and Lisianthus.
Triplets:<Eustoma russellianum
